excerpt: This spicy and fragrant Vegan Thai Green Curry is filled with healthy veggies and is perfect for a cozy night in.

ingredients.name: Mixed vegetables
ingredients.notes: cut into bite-sized pieces (e.g. carrots, bell peppers, baby corn)

instructions.name: Making the Curry Paste
instructions: Add all the ingredients for the curry paste to a blender and blend to a smooth paste.

instructions.name: Making the Curry
instructions: Heat the vegetable oil in a pot over medium-high heat.
Add the mixed vegetables and tofu and stir fry for 5-7 minutes or until slightly browned.
Add the curry paste to the pot and stir to combine with the vegetables.
Add the coconut milk, kaffir lime leaves, sugar, soy sauce, and salt.
Bring the mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat to low.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
